name: Jeep
0:
”Alexa, ask Jeep to check the tire pressure of my car.”
”Alexa, ask Jeep how much gas is in my car.”
”Alexa, ask Jeep to find the nearest gas station,”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jeep
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Command your Jeep® Brand vehicle from the comfort of your home using only your voice. Simply ask Alexa on an Alexa-enabled device to start/stop the engine (1), lock/unlock the doors (1), check fuel status, and more.

With available navigation, you can ask Alexa to find restaurants and other destinations and then send the addresses directly to your vehicle for added convenience.
 
SUPPORTED VEHICLES

• 2014 and newer Jeep Cherokee
• 2017 and newer Jeep Compass
• 2014 and newer Jeep Grand Cherokee
• 2015 and newer Jeep Renegade
• 2018 and newer Jeep Wrangler
• 2020 and newer Jeep Gladiator
• 2021 and newer Jeep Grand Cherokee L
• 2022 and newer Jeep Wagoneer
• 2022 and newer Jeep Grand Wagoneer

EQUIPMENT REQUIREMENTS

• Must be equipped with the Uconnect 3C/3C NAV, 4C/4C NAV with 8.4-inch Display or Uconnect 5
• Also available on 2020 Jeep Compass vehicles with 5-inch and 7-inch Displays
• Must have account set up with either SiriusXM Guardian (2), Uconnect Access (3), Jeep Connect (4) or Wagoneer Connect (4) and be in a trial or paid subscription

SAMPLE COMMANDS

• “Alexa, Ask Jeep to start my car with Voice Code XXXX.”
• “Alexa, Ask Jeep how much gas is in my car.”
To get a complete list of commands, say, “Alexa, Ask Jeep for help with my car.”

SETUP INSTRUCTIONS

To link your Uconnect system to Amazon Alexa:

1. Download the Amazon Alexa App on your iPhone or Android
2. Launch the app, then tap MENU and go to SKILLS
3. Search for Jeep, then select by tapping ENABLE
4. Select LINK ACCOUNT
5. Log in using your Vehicle Owner Account ID and password
6. Create your Voice Code on the Setting screen then select AUTHORIZE


(1) Vehicle must be registered with SiriusXM Guardian™, Uconnect Access, Jeep Connect or Wagoneer Connect be in an active and usable cellular range, have an active subscription, and properly equipped with remote features. You are responsible for using remote features in accordance with any laws, rules or ordinances in effect in your vehicle’s location. See Terms of Service for service limitations. 

(2) All SiriusXM Guardian™-equipped vehicles come with a 12-month trial effective on the date of purchase or lease of a new vehicle. Enrollment in the trial is required to receive service. Upon expiration of the trial period, purchase of a subscription is required to continue SiriusXM Guardian. SiriusXM Guardian is available only on equipped vehicles purchased within the United States and Puerto Rico. Services can only be used where cellular coverage is available. See Uconnect® and SiriusXM Guardian Terms of Service for complete service limitations.

(3) Uconnect® Access services require subscriptions. Uconnect Access is available only on equipped vehicles purchased within the 50 United States. Services can only be used where cellular coverage is available, see coverage map for details. For a complete list of Uconnect Access services, please visit https://www.driveuconnect.com/uconnectaccess.html. 

(4) All vehicles properly equipped to receive connected services come with a 3-month trial of the full suite of Jeep Connect or Wagoneer Connect services effective from the date of purchase or lease of a new vehicle. Enrollment in the trial is required to receive service. Upon expiration of the trial period, purchase of a subscription is required to continue or renew services. Jeep Connect or Wagoneer Connect are available only on equipped vehicles purchased within the United States and Puerto Rico. Services can only be used where cellular coverage is available. See the applicable Terms of Service for complete terms and conditions, including service limitations.
